revision.text: {{Doomwiki|link=Strife|name=Strife}}The very last Doom-based commercial game for the PC, made by Rogue Entertainment and published by Velocity. It merged first-person action with RPG elements such as inventory, quests, dialog trees, mission objectives, and upgrades to the player and was arguably the most advanced Doom-based game ever; though it lacked some features [[Hexen]] had. [[Category:Supported games]]
